roleset.name: ricochet, rebound

role.descr: point at which arg1 hits and bounces off

example.name: stot-v
example.text: Didn't realise I pure stotted the ball off @The_Primate_'s heed either!

example.name: stot-v
example.text: For example , cheetahs abandon more hunts when the gazelle stots , and in the event they do give chase , they are far less likely to make a kill .

example.name: stotting-n
example.text: Stotting is jumping into the air with the legs straight and stiff , and the white rear fully visible .

roleset.note: STOT-V, STOTTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
